txt.en:
'The Assembly has made their decision. We have pushed back and stopped Saruman for now, but perhaps at too great a cost. I require one last favour of you. 

'You must report to the fishing-village of Durgors in the south-west corner of the Dunbog. There, you will find some of the leaders of the Boar-clan movement. They must be told what has happened. Saruman is becoming a greater threat than we had ever believed.

'Hurry!'

'Thank you for coming. This is terrible news. With the reported kidnappings, the Abominations, and now the attack on the Pristine Glade, Saruman is clearly planning something terrible. We need to prepare to meet with the leaders of the Boar-clan.\n\n'Speak with me again after you have caught your breath. We need to gather supplies for a long journey.'
'Report to the leaders of the Boar-clan in Durgors.'
The Boar-clan is holed up in the fishing-village of Durgors.
The leaders of the Boar-clan can be found at Durgors, south-west of Lhan Rhos.\n\nElder DÃ©in has asked you to report to the leaders of the Boar-clan movement.
